Text: I won't start the process of posting the SD version until after this HD swarm has multiple seeds (that's how it's always been)
Utorrent  won't let me download at all, it says the trackers loaded but nothing is on my computer.

Many thanks, burgundyranger and dekabroken!

Fantastic series of torrents, every single episode of Samurai (I'm referring to both seasons as Samurai because fuck the 'Super' shit) is flawless.  Despite the fact that Samurai was garbage sometimes, due to the lack of given shits by Saban, you have done a great service to PR fans, and I greatly look forward to your rips of Megaforce as we head into the anniversary season.

Thanks for everything.  See you guys next year, and may the power protect you!
